alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 13 at 4:28PM CDT until April 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Western Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Eastern Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 500 PM MDT/600 PM CDT/. * At 327 PM MDT/427 PM CDT/, a dust channel was 8 miles southwest of Brewster, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 23 and 45. Locations impacted include... Brewster and Edson. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be unhealthy and has been known to lead to Valley Fever. Avoid outdoor exposure. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! Strong wind gusts to 50 mph are also possible as weak thunderstorms move through the area. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.
